content: in this legal case a court in potenza ruled on a claim brought by sasmsl against another party the court declared the dissolution of a community property located in melfi and ordered sa to pay a sum of money to sm the court also ordered the transcription of the judgment the case began with a lawsuit filed by sa claiming ownership of a share of the property the defendants opposed the division of the property and requested either allocation or sale a courtappointed technical consultant determined the value of the property and based on their findings the court ruled in favor of sa ordering the assignment of the property and the payment of a sum of money the court also considered the waiver of claims made by the parties and the costs of the litigation the final ruling rejects any objections and assigns the property to sa who must pay a sum of €364800 to sm with interest the judgment must be transcribed by the responsible registrar the costs of the litigation are to be paid by both parties along with the settled counsel fees the ruling was made on 04032023
